product_name: Burley Travoy Upper Market Trailer Bag
long_description: The Burley Travoy Upper Market trailer bag buttons securely onto the frame of your Travoy bike trailer and is the perfect catch-all for keys, phone, small change, a loaf of bread or a 6-pack of cans. Includes interior slots for phone and keys. Upper Market Bag closes with quick-release buckles. Lifts off easily for use off the bike.
short_description: The Burley Travoy Upper Market trailer bag buttons securely onto the frame of your Travoy bike trailer and is the perfect catch-all for keys, phone, small change, a loaf of bread or a 6-pack of cans.
